file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-31-02-04 - INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT (ICU) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT (ICU) - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the interphone control unit. B. The interphone control unit is installed on the overhead panel. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH IN- INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT - REMOV- TERPHONE CONTROL 23-31-02-000-801-A AL UNIT INSTALLED AIRCRAFT WITH IN- INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT - INSTAL- TERPHONE CONTROL 23-31-02-400-801-A LATION UNIT INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-31-02 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT INSTALLED 2. INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) The procedures for the removal of the interphone control unit is given in the Control Panel Typical Removal (AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - REMOVAL (TYPICAL) C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-02 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT INSTALLED 3. INTERPHONE CONTROL UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) The procedures for the installation of the interphone control unit is given in the Control Panel Typical Installation (AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - INSTALLATION (TYPICAL) C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H.
